body:
Syntax: cast 'detect magic'

Detect magic reveals magical auras on objects, showing which items are
enchanted. This is invaluable for identifying magical weapons, armor,
and other valuable items.

Classes: Cleric, Mage
Level: 2 (Cleric), 2 (Mage)
Mana Cost: 5  
Duration: 12 hours
Position: Standing or Fighting

When this spell is active, magical items will glow with a special aura.
This helps you distinguish between mundane and magical equipment.

See Also: DETECT INVISIBLE, IDENTIFY
